short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that redirects to the website https://webleonardo.com when clicking on the icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a redirect to the Web Leonardo Studio website. This makes it much easier for people to keep this extension in their browser. This site has links to newspaper collections, a browser for Android, Amazon and other activities.
